# Feast (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* | Olladra |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** You have immunity to ingested poisons and to diseases spread by ingestion.

**Feast Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Goodberry (Spell)|Goodberry]]****:** 2d4 berries each cure 1 hp (max. 8 hp/24 hours).

**2** **[[Delay Poison (Spell)|Delay Poison]]****:** Stops poison from harming subject for 1 hour/level.

**3** **[[Create Food and Water (Spell)|Create Food and Water]]****:** Feeds three humans (or one horse)/level.

**4** **[[Neutralize Poison (Spell)|Neutralize Poison]]****:** Immunizes subject against poison, detoxifies venom in or on subject.

**5** **[[Secure Shelter (Spell)|Secure Shelter]]****:** Creates sturdy cottage.

**6** **[[Heroes' Feast (Spell)|Heroesâ€™ Feast]]****:** Food for one creature/level cures and grants combat bonuses.

**7** **[[Mage's Magnificent Mansion (Spell)|Mage's Magnificent Mansion]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Door leads to extradimensional mansion.

**8** **[[Remove Venom (Spell)|Detoxify]]****:** Neutralize poison in 30-ft. radius.

**9** **[[Feast of Champions (Spell)|Feast of Champions]]****:** Food for one creature/level heals and grants comprehensive bonuses.
